title: 1887 Old Judge Brooklyn Minis For Sale
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: 1887 Old Judge Brooklyn Minis For Sale
posts.post_content:
Toole--vertical crease but otherwise nice-----SOLD
Porter--wear, dirt and lower left crease-------SOLD

Burch--crease, looks nice but is rebacked-----$3500

Shipping and insurance are additional at estimated cost. If interested please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Unusual, replying to a pair of BST posts in one day but can't help myself.  Don't recall but a couple Brooklyn minis changing hands over the last 20 years.  The Toole is especially nice, good luck.  The 1887 Brooklyn Old Judge cards are an interesting study.
Porter and Toole are gone---Burch is still available
Burch has been chopped down to $2500
